articles.title: Google drops Play Store option for all Android users – and starts deleting your data - Express
articles.description: IF YOU still have digital purchases stored in Google Play Music, you should race to download or transfer the songs, playlists and albums as soon as possible. If not, Google will begin deleting your purchases right now.
